Sorry, but what are you going to tell us?
creator: rpluem@apache.org
wrowe@apache.org
text:
You mention XP but PHP reports this is Linux.  At the same time, this
result gives us no indication of a problem in httpd, it appears to
originate in PHP itself, or the side effect of a bug in the PHP code.

Please take this issue up with an appropriate PHP support forum.
